verbose_text: To test the hypothesis that miR-29b modulates SIRT1 and PGC-1alpha expression, the mRNA and protein expression levels of SIRT1 and PGC-1alpha were measured by RT-qPCR and western blot analysis, respectively in the HEI-OC1 cells following transfection with the miR-29b mimic or the miR-29b inhibitor.
